trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Powder Keg. {T}, Sacrifice Powder Keg: Destroy each artifact and creature with mana value equal to the number of fuse counters on Powder Keg.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Powder Keg. {T}, Sacrifice Powder Keg: Destroy each artifact and creature with mana value equal to the number of fuse counters on Powder Keg.
